module.name: product_view_definition_relationship
module.purpose: The Product view definition relationship application module supports the requirement to represent context-dependent relationships between products.

inscope.li: identification of a relationship between two definitions of product;
identification of the use of a product in the context of another;

outscope.li: any specific relationship between two definitions of product;
outscope.note: Specific types of relationships, for example assembly relationship and make-from relationship, are specified in other application modules.
